amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the EPA's Hazardous Substance Superfund by $130 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Environmental Protection Agency--Science and Technology by $130 million and to increase funding for the Environmental Protection Agency--Hazardous Substance Superfund by $130 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 344 (Roll no. 193).
